rules_text: White spells you cast cost {B} less to cast. Blue spells you cast cost {R} less to cast. Black spells you cast cost {G} less to cast. Red spells you cast cost {W} less to cast. Green spells you cast cost {U} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.
notes: (For example, if you cast a Cleric spell with mana cost {1}{W}, it costs {1} to cast.)
